select ID, order_no, USER_ID, MERCHANT_ID, MERCHANT_NAME, CUSTOMER_ID, CUSTOMER_NAME, sex_name, TEL, CARD_TYPE, CARD, CREDIT, PRECREDIT, AMOUNT, COMPANY, BRANCH, emp_id, MANAGER, PERIODS, CREAT_TIME, applay_time, ALTER_TIME, loan_time, repay_date, fee, APEX3, BAK, state, repay_type, rate, merchandise_type, merchandise_name, merchandise_id, merchandise_brand, merchandise_model, merchandise_brand_id, merchandise_code, merchandise_version_id, merchandise_type_id, provinces_id, city_id, distric_id, provinces, city, distric, product_kind, product_type, product_type_name, product_Id, product_name, product_name_name, product_detail, product_detail_name, product_detail_code, sex, emp_number, applay_money, loan_amount, contract_amount, repay_money, order_type, predict_price, receive_id, is_refuse, commodity_state, withdraw_state, order_submission_time, source, contract_no, overdue_state, manageFee, quickTrialFee, fee_state, merchandise_version, requestno, is_sign, weight, price, identry_rule_state, person_rule_state, yuqi_fee, delivery_state, rebates_state, goldMass, answer_state, answer_score, loan_state, contract_time, diy_type, diy_days, offline_order, Job, Examine_time, Service_fee, Order_state, loan_purpose, complete, asset_state, pay_back_user, pay_back_card, bankId, merchandise_url, score_card from mag_order
mapper.update:
UPDATE mag_order
AMOUNT = #{amount},
CREDIT = #{credit},
PRECREDIT = #{precredit},
predict_price=#{predictPrice},
applay_money=#{applayMoney},
Order_state=#{orderState},
answer_state=#{answerState},
answer_score=#{answerScore},
commodity_state=#{commodityState},
alter_time=#{alterTime},
loan_amount=#{loanAmount},
Examine_time=#{examineTime},
contract_amount=#{contractAmount},
repay_money=#{repayMoney},
repay_date=#{repayDate},
pay_back_user=#{payBackUser},
pay_back_card=#{payBackCard},
loan_time=#{loanTime},
where order_no = #{orderNo}
mapper.select: select contract_amount,PERIODS,user_id,tel,applay_money, pay_back_user, pay_back_card,loan_time from mag_order where order_no = #{orderNo}
